name: Slightly Agitated Kiwi
description:
Fly To The Fruit as the Slightly Agitated Kiwi!Level-Based 2D Obstacle Course With Flight Physics. How To Play:

Pivot the Kiwi in the air using the W and S keys on a keyboard.

Use the Space Bar to give your Kiwi a little boost in those hard to reach places.

Made By:

Developed by DallaswithaD, using Unity

Kiwi Bird 3D model, Background, Level Revisions, and QA by Nimyu

Airplane 3D model, Kiwi Fruit 3D model, and Dev consultation by SwiftZonic

Slightly Agitated Kiwi was made for West Jam 8, a game jam hosted by the West Jam Community of Brandon MB, Canada. The jam was virtual, taking place over their Discord server at https://discord.gg/VrFCF47Gn3
